name: SKYTRADERS PTY LTD
about:
Skytraders Pty Ltd is not a flying school, but rather an Australian airline specializing in specialist air services. Here is a description tailored to their unique profile:

Skytraders Pty Ltd, founded in 1979, is a principal provider of specialist air services to the Australian Federal Government. With 44 years of global aviation operations, we deliver safety, certainty, and value. ISO 9001 & 45001 accredited, we hold one of the broadest approvals from the Civil Aviation Safety Authority. Our services include Cold Climate operations, Surveillance & Survey, Special Missions, Defence, Medevac & Aeromedical, and Executive Transport & Charter. We are renowned for our innovative solutions and robust safety systems, particularly in our long-standing role as the primary air link to Antarctica for the Australian Antarctic Division. Skytraders continues to set world standards in aviation, ensuring the highest standards in flight procedures and operational certainty.
